carbonProduction(long[][]) - Method in class Earth
takes an array with how much CO2 there is on each place in the grid and according to what ressources are on the grid we update the array

E

Earth - Class in Unnamed Package
class Earth contains a grid on which we place mines and forests - it is our enviroment Earth takes care of what CO2 does on our grid

F

fixingClimateChange(long[][], double, double, ArrayList<Agent>, Earth) - Method in class Agent
this function represents what the agent can do during the year first we find where is the least amount of carbon then we either go to that place or to a random one (based on a given probability) if a current agent can do there it goes there: - if there is a coal mine or nothing, they close it and build a forest - if there is a forest they plant more trees each action generates an amount of co2 we can absorb to better the enviroment
Flora - Class in Unnamed Package
abstract class Flora represents any type of greenery it was created to create classes similar to forests in the future ex: meadows, parks
Flora(String, int) - Constructor for class Flora
constructor for Flora
Forest - Class in Unnamed Package

Forest() - Constructor for class Forest

Forest(Forest) - Constructor for class Forest

Forest(String) - Constructor for class Forest
constructor for a Forest, initialises a forest - no trees, no carbon
Forest(String, int) - Constructor for class Forest
constructor for a Forest, initialises quantite number of trees

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class TestSimulation
Simulates the climate of Paris
makingClimateChangeWorse(long[][], ArrayList<Agent>, Earth) - Method in class Agent
this function represents what the agent can do during the year we generate a random place if it's close enough : we check if it's free and if it is: - if there is a coal mine, they make it generate more co2 - if probability is on our side and there is a forest, they cut out all the trees each action generates an amount of co2 that worsens out enviroment

S

seDeplacer(int, int, ArrayList<Agent>) - Method in class Agent
returns true if there is an agent on given coordinates, else returns false, if there isn't an Agent on a given place, current Agent makes a trip to that given place

setCarbonProduction(long) - Method in class CoalMine

simulateClimateChange() - Method in class Simulation
simulates climate changes in our enviroment we contrustruct an earth and a list of all ressources (forests and coal mines) we initialise forests in @param mf number, coal mines in @param mm number, eco agents in @param ng number and bad agents in @param nb number each year coal mines produce CO2, forests grow and new trees are planted by seed dispersal after a century of upsupervised mining too much CO2 will be in the air now eco friendly agents and damadging agents do their assigned taskts utill we get an amount of carbon that our earth can sustain
Simulation - Class in Unnamed Package
regroups all the classes to produce a simulation where forests can be planted, can grow and coal mines work agents interact and fight for their goals
Simulation(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Simulation
initialises a simulation of an earth with given arguments if arguments aren't given within a range, program throws an exception and in the catch modyfies them
